metadata.name: PowerShell Execution With Potential Decryption Capabilities
metadata.comment: Detects PowerShell commands that decrypt an ".LNK" "file to drop the next stage of the malware.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\pwsh.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('powershell\\.exe', 'pwsh\\.dll')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('get-childitem ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dir ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('gci ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ls '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('get-content ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('gc ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cat ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('type ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('readallbytes'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ^| ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('*.lnk')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-recurse')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-skip ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -expandproperty ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('*.lnk')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('writeallbytes')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' .length ')))

output.summary: Detects PowerShell commands that decrypt an ".LNK" "file to drop the next stage of the malware.
